Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

11  KSRootSurfaceNavigator::KSRootSurfaceNavigator() :
12  fSurfaceNavigator( NULL ),
13  fStep( NULL ),
14  fTerminatorParticle( NULL ),
15  fInteractionParticle( NULL ),
16  fFinalParticle( NULL ),
17  fParticleQueue( NULL )
18  {
19  }
20  KSRootSurfaceNavigator::KSRootSurfaceNavigator( const KSRootSurfaceNavigator& aCopy ) :
21  KSComponent(),
22  fSurfaceNavigator( aCopy.fSurfaceNavigator ),
23  fStep( aCopy.fStep ),
24  fTerminatorParticle( aCopy.fTerminatorParticle ),
25  fInteractionParticle( aCopy.fInteractionParticle ),
26  fFinalParticle( aCopy.fFinalParticle ),
27  fParticleQueue( aCopy.fParticleQueue )
28  {
29  }
30  KSRootSurfaceNavigator* KSRootSurfaceNavigator::Clone() const
31  {
32  return new KSRootSurfaceNavigator( *this );
33  }
34  KSRootSurfaceNavigator::~KSRootSurfaceNavigator()
35  {
36  }
37 
38  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::ExecuteNavigation( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSParticle& aNavigationParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aSecondaries ) const
39  {
40  if( fSurfaceNavigator == NULL )
41  {
42  navmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> cannot execute navigation with no surface navigation set" << eom;
43  }
44  fSurfaceNavigator->ExecuteNavigation( anInitialParticle, aNavigationParticle, aFinalParticle, aSecondaries );
45  return;
46  }
47 
48  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::FinalizeNavigation( KSParticle& aFinalParticle ) const
49  {
50  if( fSurfaceNavigator == NULL )
51  {
52  navmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> cannot finalize navigation with no surface navigation set" << eom;
53  }
54  fSurfaceNavigator->FinalizeNavigation( aFinalParticle );
55  return;
56  }
57 
58  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::SetSurfaceNavigator( KSSurfaceNavigator* aSurfaceNavigator )
59  {
60  if( fSurfaceNavigator != NULL )
61  {
62  navmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> tried to set surface navigator <" << aSurfaceNavigator->GetName() << "> with surface navigator <" << fSurfaceNavigator->GetName() << "> already set" << eom;
63  return;
64  }
65  navmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> setting surface navigator <" << aSurfaceNavigator->GetName() << ">" << eom );
66  fSurfaceNavigator = aSurfaceNavigator;
67  return;
68  }
69  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::ClearSurfaceNavigator( KSSurfaceNavigator* aSurfaceNavigator )
70  {
71  if( fSurfaceNavigator != aSurfaceNavigator )
72  {
73  navmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> tried to remove surface navigator <" << aSurfaceNavigator->GetName() << "> with surface navigator <" << fSurfaceNavigator->GetName() << "> already set" << eom;
74  return;
75  }
76  navmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> clearing surface navigator <" << aSurfaceNavigator->GetName() << ">" << eom );
77  fSurfaceNavigator = NULL;
78  return;
79  }
80 
81  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::SetStep( KSStep* aStep )
82  {
83  fStep = aStep;
84  fTerminatorParticle = &(aStep->TerminatorParticle());
85  fInteractionParticle = &(aStep->InteractionParticle());
86  fFinalParticle = &(aStep->FinalParticle());
87  fParticleQueue = &(aStep->ParticleQueue());
88  return;
89  }
90 
91  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::ExecuteNavigation()
92  {
93  ExecuteNavigation( *fTerminatorParticle, *fInteractionParticle, *fFinalParticle, *fParticleQueue );
94  fStep->SurfaceNavigationFlag() = true;
95  fFinalParticle->ReleaseLabel( fStep->SurfaceNavigationName() );
96 
97  fStep->ContinuousTime() = 0.;
98  fStep->ContinuousLength() = 0.;
99  fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() = 0.;
100  fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() = 0.;
101  fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() += fParticleQueue->size();
102  fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() += fFinalParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() - fInteractionParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV();
103  fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() += (fFinalParticle->GetMomentum() - fInteractionParticle->GetMomentum()).Magnitude();
104 
105  navmsg_debug( "surface navigation:" << eom );
106  navmsg_debug( " surface navigation name: <" << fStep->GetSurfaceNavigationName() << ">" << eom );
107  navmsg_debug( " step continuous time: <" << fStep->ContinuousTime() << ">" << eom );
108  navmsg_debug( " step continuous length: <" << fStep->ContinuousLength() << ">" << eom );
109  navmsg_debug( " step continuous energy change: <" << fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() << ">" << eom );
110  navmsg_debug( " step continuous momentum change: <" << fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() << ">" << eom );
111  navmsg_debug( " step discrete secondaries: <" << fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() << ">" << eom );
112  navmsg_debug( " step discrete energy change: <" << fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() << ">" << eom );
113  navmsg_debug( " step discrete momentum change: <" << fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() << ">" << eom );
114 
115  navmsg_debug( "surface navigation final particle state: " << eom );
116  navmsg_debug( " final particle space: <" << (fFinalParticle->GetCurrentSpace() ? fFinalParticle->GetCurrentSpace()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
117  navmsg_debug( " final particle surface: <" << (fFinalParticle->GetCurrentSurface() ? fFinalParticle->GetCurrentSurface()->GetName() : "") << ">" << eom );
118  navmsg_debug( " final particle side: <" << (fFinalParticle->GetCurrentSide() ? fFinalParticle->GetCurrentSide()->GetName() : "") << ">" << eom );
119  navmsg_debug( " final particle time: <" << fFinalParticle->GetTime() << ">" << eom );
120  navmsg_debug( " final particle length: <" << fFinalParticle->GetLength() << ">" << eom );
121  navmsg_debug( " final particle position: <" << fFinalParticle->GetPosition().X() << ", " << fFinalParticle->GetPosition().Y() << ", " << fFinalParticle->GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom );
122  navmsg_debug( " final particle momentum: <" << fFinalParticle->GetMomentum().X() << ", " << fFinalParticle->GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << fFinalParticle->GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom );
123  navmsg_debug( " final particle kinetic energy: <" << fFinalParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ">" << eom );
124  navmsg_debug( " final particle electric field: <" << fFinalParticle->GetElectricField().X() << "," << fFinalParticle->GetElectricField().Y() << "," << fFinalParticle->GetElectricField().Z() << ">" << eom );
125  navmsg_debug( " final particle magnetic field: <" << fFinalParticle->GetMagneticField().X() << "," << fFinalParticle->GetMagneticField().Y() << "," << fFinalParticle->GetMagneticField().Z() << ">" << eom );
126  navmsg_debug( " final particle angle to magnetic field: <" << fFinalParticle->GetPolarAngleToB() << ">" << eom );
127 
128  return;
129  }
130 
131  void KSRootSurfaceNavigator::FinalizeNavigation()
132  {
133  FinalizeNavigation( *fFinalParticle );
134  return;
135  }
136 
137  STATICINT sKSRootSurfaceNavigatorDict =
138  KSDictionary< KSRootSurfaceNavigator >::AddCommand( &KSRootSurfaceNavigator::SetSurfaceNavigator, &KSRootSurfaceNavigator::ClearSurfaceNavigator, "set_surface_navigator", "clear_surface_navigator" );
139
